title: [Exact] Recruiting Members
body:
hello my name is Ex Titan I'm starting up a team, we're going to play later on tonight when i get back from work ill look over everyones applications. I will be looking to play at least 5 days a week with this team when i start it up.


Roles
Top- ?
Jungle-?
Mid-?
Adc- Ex Titan
Support-?



I would like to have information for players gold- diamond because that's the players i am allowed to play with

Role
Champion pool
what do you do best
What to you do worst
time zone
when are you available

replies.body:
Hello, I''m chris

My cap last season was Gold 1

Role: Jungle/Mid can fill Top/Adc well.

Champion Pool: (In no particular order)

Jg: Elise, Hecarim, Vi, Lee, Shyvana, Udyr, Malphite, Yi, Trundle are champions I "main", but I own them all and pick up champions pretty quick as I've played all of them before.

Mid: Two faves are Ori and Xerath, can play Zed, Malz, LB, Lux but I tend to favor Mids who have mobility to respond to events that happen in the jungle, especially early. Also, never underestimate Cho'Gath mid. {{champion:31}} 



What I do best: I am a relatively strong laner, my cs decent, I tend to main champs that can farm safe in a bad matchup, I am also a decent shotcaller, I can ping with decent accuracy and I am versed in reading the enemy team (we're low elo after all). I've studied LeagueCraft and know the basics. I have really good reaction timing, mid-fight wards, reaction trades. I usually know how a fight is supposed to go for my team to win it. I always buy pinks and let my team where where the enemy jungler is.


What to you do worst: I get nervous, I am a cautious player who sometimes spends a little too much time deliberating actions and consequences, other times I can make mistakes and end up getting 1v1ed by the enemy jungler, but I love invading and stomping early to push for that early dragon. Oh and I HATE playing against shaco xD


Time Zone: ADT (eastern Canada)

most nights after 6-7pm.
who is calling for you guys and how much experience do they have

> [{quoted}](name=Trufflie,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=exf2Jgbh,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-03-16T20:52:17.750+0000)
>
> who is calling for you guys and how much experience do they have

Well me for now and I shot called last season for a gold 1 team so I have an alright amount of experience in doing so

Role: ad
Champion pool: All ad's
what do you do best: Farming,positioning, outplaying all that good ad stuff 
What to you do worst: lane wise i do my worst at top. playing wise i can greed
time zone: central
when are you available: earlier than 2pm would be perfect but i know not everyone can do that. my scheduled if flexable

We already have an ADC in me, if you play any other roles I'll be glad to try you out

Role: Mid
Champion pool: Zed, Diana, LB, Kat, Viktor, Fizz, Annie, Ahri
what do you do best:Farming, Roaming, teamfights, map awareness
What to you do worst: Unconfident when behind, Laning phase against certain champs
time zone: ESt
when are you available: all the time

Role: Mid
Champion Pool: {{champion:103}} {{champion:34}} {{champion:268}} {{champion:43}} {{champion:38}} {{champion:7}} {{champion:127}} {{champion:61}}{{champion:99}} {{champion:117}}  {{champion:161}} {{champion:112}} {{champion:101}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:26}} 
What do you do best: Laning, teamfighting, csing, positioning, wave control, almost everything.
What to you do worst: Roaming, shotcalling.
Time Zone: CST
Availability: 3pm-12pm
